meanings.sent1: The ultraminiaturized computer chip was barely visible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The ultraminiaturized camera could fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent3: I tried to find the ultraminiaturized screw in the box of spare parts, but it was too tiny to see!
meanings.sent4: Her ultraminiaturized jewelry collection was like a treasure trove of miniature wonders.
meanings.sent5: The ultraminiaturized insects in the garden seemed like tiny fairies dancing in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To make extremely small in size.
meanings.sent1: The scientist ultraminiaturized the components to create a more compact device.
meanings.sent2: She ultraminiaturized the model of the building to showcase intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The chef ultraminiaturized the desserts for a unique culinary experience.
meanings.sent4: His creativity ultraminiaturized the boundaries of traditional art.
meanings.sent5: The magician ultraminiaturized the props to surprise the audience with unexpected illusions.
